item.simplefluidtanks.tank.tooltip_detai: to remove a tank from the
item.simplefluidtanks.valve.tooltip_deta: Use the wrench on the valve to add
new tanks to the multiblock structure
without loosing any fluid. Note that
the Valve counts as a tank towards
the total capacity and emits a redstone
signal in conjunction with a comparator.
config.input_valid:
Value is valid.
(Press to reset to default)
config.input_invalid:
Value is invalid and will not be saved!
(Press to reset to default)
config.needs_world_restart: Changing this value requires a restart to take effect!
config.buckets_per_tank.tooltip: The amount of fluid one tank block can hold measured in buckets. If this value is changed, all tanks already placed in the world need to be manually updated by right-clicking the valve with the wrench.
config.tankblock_hardness.tooltip: The amount of hits the tank can take before it breaks (-1 = indestructible).
config.valveblock_hardness.tooltip: The amount of hits the valve can take before it breaks (-1 = indestructible).
